<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">

    <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
    <p id="demo"></p>
    <script>
        var text = '{ "name":"boy", "content":"function () {return 100;}", "site":"www.baidu.com"}';
        var obj = JSON.parse(text);
        obj.content = eval("(" + obj.content + ")");
        document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = obj.name + " åˆ†æ•°æ˜¯ï¼š" + obj.content();
    </script>
</body>

JSON.stringify()
